link_desc:
Modify the two perl scripts to include the MaxScale maxadmin credentials and place them in /usr/local/share/zabbix/externalscripts (or whatever your Zabbix external scripts directory is set to).

Import the template and link it to the host running MaxScale.

The scripts assume that the MaxScale has a CLI listener on port 6603, but you can modify it to your convenience.

NOTE: The scripts and the template are a mishmash of various scripts and templates I found on the Internet. Full credit goes to original script creators.
